Message:
One day, I went with
Rean outside the village.

I knew what we were
doing was really bad,
and that I needed to put
a stop to everything, but...

With her face beaming as
brightly as it did that day,
Rean tried to take me out
to an even vaster world.

I couldn’t help but feel
happy at her enthusiasm,
so I took her by the hand.

But...I’d heard
the cult was destroyed!
There’s no way they
could’ve been revived...!

Rean fights them alone
to protect me...

...but more and more scars
cover her body with
each passing minute,

before she finally
collapses to the ground.

The moment
I made that wish,
flames engulfed
everything around me.
